reviews.customers_say: Customers like the skirt's style, material quality, and color, particularly appreciating its plaid pattern. They find it comfortable and perfect for fall and holiday seasons, with one customer noting it can be dressed up for office work. The fit and length receive mixed feedback - while some find it a perfect fit with good length, others say it runs larger than expected and is too short. The stretchiness also gets mixed reviews, with several customers noting there's no stretch at all. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fall fashion
items.body: When they said to return to the office I scrambled to find the right outfit to wear in the fall, since we hadn’t been back in the office for a while. I found these and they fit perfectly, just the right length and very comfortable and stylish! It’s great for the fall because of the color and warmth. Read more
items.author: Joanna Udo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute, comfy skirt
items.body: This skirt is perfect! Not too short and not too long. I originally got a small and it was tighter than I wanted. The medium fits almost perfectly, but is a tad loose. I would say fits true to size, but if you have hips or much of a butt, size up if between sizes. I'm 5'4" and 140 lbs. Read more
items.author: The Colorado Texans

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars HIGHLY PERFUMED OUT OF THE BAG!
items.body: Cute, soft, fits well, nice lining. HAS A HIGHLY PERFUMED SMELL COMING OUT OF THE BAG I had to wash it 3 times before it went away. Read more
items.author: Susan S.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT PURCHASE
items.body: I purchased this for my daughter as a Christmas gift. She wore a black sweater with it. She usually wears a medium in a skirt. I ordered a size large to make sure it had enough room in the hips. It was a little large in the waist but we made it work. It was a cute outfit with boots and tights. I would definitely recommend this skirt. It was an awesome purchase for the price. Great material and stretchiness that offered comfort. Read more
items.author: Portia L.

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Way too big
items.body: Way too oversized, I’m a size 2 and got the XS and it’s easily a size too big. Would be cute if it fit right. Read more
items.author: Peggy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous and good quality!
items.body: This is my 2nd shirt from this store and wore the quality is very good. It’s 20% wool and 80% polyester. It feels high quality and expensive! The color is so beautiful and true to the picture shown. It’s not very elastic but the size is true to what they say. Zipper works fine! I would say it’s medium thick so you can wear it throughout the year. It feels very comfortable and warm (probably need leggings or tights). I love this skirt, I plan to wear it to work and also on casual & more dressy occasions!! Read more
items.author: Anna

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute
items.body: Very cute skirt but not the best fit and I went off the size chart. Read more
items.author: Christina D

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great skirt!
items.body: Perfect fit and length! Read more
items.author: Brittany Elius

short_description:
Womens Dress Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Dress Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Deepred, Brown, Checker Red, Rose, Brown Black, Black, Black White, Coffee, Orange, Purecamel, Suede Black, Beige, Darkbrown, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
